name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 Histy's Beginner's Item / いーすんからの初心者用アイテムパック / 伊伊贈送的初級玩家道具套裝
detailed_description:
The following items will be added with this DLC.

Detoxin x 5
Paralaxin x 5
Reflex x 5
Tuffmil x 5
Anti-Venom x 3
Anti-Paralysis x 3
Anti-Seal x 3
Anti-Virus x 3
Life Fragment x 3

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1 / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth1 / 超次次元遊戲戰機少女重生1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Betriebssystem: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Prozessor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Arbeitsspeicher: 4 GB RAM
  • Grafik: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Soundkarte: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Zusätzliche Anmerkungen: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version. On-board graphics card are not recommend. Highly recommend to have an independent graphics card.
